actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act with regard to a program designed to encourage the acquisition and installation of solar energy thermal conversion systems in residential structures located on a family farm.

summary.text: Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to make and insure loans under such Act for the solar heating or cooling of residential structures on family farms.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act with regard to a program designed to encourage the acquisition and installation of solar energy thermal conversion systems in residential structures located on a family farm.
